question: Which ministry signed MoU with Ministry of Ayush in New Delhi recently?
explanation: Ministry of Railways signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with Ministry of Ayush in New Delhi to scale up Ayush services in Railway's Zonal hospitals. As per the MoU, Ayush Services will be augmented at B. R. Singh Hospital (Kolkata) in Eastern Railway, Perambur Railway Hospital (Chennai) in Southern Railway, Central Hospital (New Delhi) of Northern Railway, JR Hospital (Mumbai) in Western Railway and the Central Hospital of Northeast Frontier Railway (Guwahati). The MoU was signed in presence of Minister of State of Railways - Manoj Sinha, Minister of State (Independent Charge) for AYUSH - Shripad Yesso Naik, Minister of State of Railways - Rajen Gohain and Chairman of Railway Board - Ashwani Lohani.
